business-solutions/hrms.title: HRMS - Human Resource Management System
business-solutions/hrms.name: HRMS
business-solutions/hrms.tagline: Complete HR Solution for Modern Businesses
business-solutions/hrms.description: Streamline your entire HR operations with our comprehensive HRMS platform. From recruitment to retirement, manage everything in one place.

hero.heading: Transform Your HR Operations
hero.description: A complete Human Resource Management System designed to automate HR processes, enhance employee experience, and boost organizational productivity.

overview.title: All-in-One HR Management Platform
overview.description: Our HRMS is a comprehensive cloud-based solution that transforms how you manage your workforce. From payroll processing to performance management, everything is automated and accessible from anywhere.

features.title: Employee Management
features.description: Centralized employee database with complete profile management, document storage, and organizational hierarchy visualization.

features.title: Payroll Automation
features.description: Automated salary calculation, tax deductions, statutory compliance, and direct deposit with detailed payslips.

features.title: Attendance Tracking
features.description: Biometric integration, GPS tracking, shift management, and real-time attendance monitoring.

features.title: Leave Management
features.description: Online leave applications, approval workflows, leave balance tracking, and calendar integration.

features.title: Performance Management
features.description: Goal setting, KPI tracking, 360-degree feedback, and automated performance review cycles.

features.title: Recruitment Module
features.description: Job posting, applicant tracking, interview scheduling, and candidate evaluation workflows.

features.title: Training & Development
features.description: Learning management, skill gap analysis, training calendar, and certification tracking.

features.title: Reports & Analytics
features.description: Real-time dashboards, custom reports, workforce analytics, and compliance reporting.

benefits: Eliminate payroll errors and ensure compliance
Mobile access for employees and managers

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your HR Operations?
cta.description: Join thousands of companies using our HRMS to streamline their workforce management.

education/school-management.title: School Management System
education/school-management.name: School Management
education/school-management.description: Transform your educational institution with our comprehensive school management system. Manage students, staff, academics, and administration seamlessly.

hero.heading: Digitize Your School Operations
hero.description: An all-in-one school management platform that connects students, teachers, parents, and administrators with powerful tools for modern education.

overview.title: Complete School Management Platform
overview.description: Our school management system is designed to simplify every aspect of school administration, from admissions to examinations, with powerful features for students, teachers, parents, and administrators.

features.title: Student Management
features.description: Complete student lifecycle management including admission, enrollment, academic records, and alumni tracking.

features.title: Attendance System
features.description: Digital attendance tracking with biometric integration, SMS notifications, and automated reports.

features.title: Timetable Management
features.description: Automated timetable generation, teacher scheduling, room allocation, and conflict resolution.

features.title: Examination & Grading
features.description: Online exam scheduling, grade entry, report card generation, and result analysis.

features.title: Fee Management
features.description: Online fee collection, payment gateway integration, receipt generation, and financial reporting.

features.title: Library Management
features.description: Book cataloging, issue/return tracking, fine management, and digital library resources.

features.title: Transport Management
features.description: Route planning, GPS tracking, driver management, and parent notifications.

features.title: Parent Portal
features.description: Real-time updates on attendance, grades, assignments, and direct communication with teachers.

benefits: Mobile app for parents and students

cta.title: Ready to Modernize Your School?
cta.description: Join thousands of schools worldwide using our platform to enhance education delivery.

retail/ecommerce-platform.title: Ecommerce Platform
retail/ecommerce-platform.name: Ecommerce Platform
retail/ecommerce-platform.description: Launch and scale your online store with our powerful ecommerce platform. Everything you need to sell online, from products to payments.

hero.heading: Powerful Ecommerce Made Simple
hero.description: Launch your online store in minutes with our feature-rich ecommerce platform. Built for growth, designed for success.

overview.title: Complete Ecommerce Solution
overview.description: Our ecommerce platform provides everything you need to start, run, and grow your online business. From beautiful storefronts to powerful backend tools, we've got you covered.

features.title: Store Builder
features.description: Easy-to-use drag-and-drop builder with 100+ professional themes. No coding required.

features.title: Product Management
features.description: Unlimited products, variants, digital goods, bulk import/export, and advanced categorization.

features.title: Payment Gateway
features.description: Accept payments via credit cards, digital wallets, COD, and 50+ payment methods globally.

features.title: Order Management
features.description: Automated order processing, shipment tracking, return management, and customer notifications.

features.title: Inventory Control
features.description: Real-time stock tracking, low stock alerts, multi-warehouse support, and automatic reordering.

features.title: Marketing Tools
features.description: Email campaigns, discount coupons, loyalty programs, abandoned cart recovery, and SEO optimization.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Real-time sales reports, customer insights, conversion tracking, and revenue analytics.

features.title: Multi-vendor Support
features.description: Build marketplaces with vendor onboarding, commission management, and vendor dashboards.

benefits: Launch your store in under 30 minutes
Scale to millions of products and orders

cta.title: Ready to Start Selling Online?
cta.description: Join 50,000+ businesses already selling successfully on our platform.

education/certificate-management.title: Certificate Management System
education/certificate-management.name: Certificate Management
education/certificate-management.description: Issue, verify, and manage digital certificates with blockchain-backed authenticity. Perfect for educational institutions and corporate training.

hero.heading: Secure Digital Certificate Platform
hero.description: Issue tamper-proof digital certificates with blockchain verification. Automate certificate generation, distribution, and lifetime verification.

overview.title: Blockchain-Backed Certificate Solution
overview.description: Our certificate management system combines ease of use with enterprise-grade security. Issue professional certificates in bulk, enable instant verification, and eliminate fraud with blockchain technology.

features.title: Certificate Design Studio
features.description: Create beautiful certificates with drag-and-drop designer, custom templates, and branding options.

features.title: Bulk Issuance
features.description: Generate and distribute thousands of certificates instantly with Excel/CSV import and automated email delivery.

features.title: Blockchain Verification
features.description: Every certificate is recorded on blockchain for permanent, tamper-proof verification.

features.title: QR Code Integration
features.description: Each certificate includes a unique QR code for instant mobile verification by anyone, anywhere.

features.title: Digital Signatures
features.description: Add multiple digital signatures with authority verification and timestamp recording.

features.title: Certificate Portal
features.description: Recipients get a personalized portal to view, download, and share their certificates on social media.

features.title: Analytics & Reports
features.description: Track issuance, verification requests, and generate detailed reports for compliance.

features.title: API Access
features.description: Enable third-party verification with RESTful API for seamless integration with HR systems.

cta.title: Ready to Go Digital with Certificates?
cta.description: Join thousands of institutions issuing verified digital certificates.

business-solutions/crm.title: CRM - Customer Relationship Management
business-solutions/crm.name: CRM
business-solutions/crm.description: Manage your entire customer lifecycle with our powerful CRM. From lead generation to customer retention, everything in one platform.

hero.heading: Your Complete CRM Solution
hero.description: A comprehensive customer relationship management platform that helps you attract, engage, and delight customers at every stage of their journey.

overview.title: All-in-One Customer Management
overview.description: Our CRM brings together sales, marketing, and customer service in one powerful platform. Track every interaction, automate workflows, and deliver exceptional customer experiences.

features.title: Contact Management
features.description: Centralized contact database with complete interaction history, social profiles, and custom fields.

features.title: Sales Pipeline
features.description: Visual sales pipeline with drag-and-drop stages, deal tracking, and forecasting.

features.title: Lead Management
features.description: Capture leads from multiple sources, score automatically, and assign to sales reps intelligently.

features.title: Email Integration
features.description: Two-way email sync, templates, tracking, and automated follow-up sequences.

features.title: Task Automation
features.description: Automate repetitive tasks, set up workflows, and trigger actions based on customer behavior.

features.title: Customer Support
features.description: Helpdesk ticketing, knowledge base, live chat, and customer satisfaction tracking.

features.title: Reports & Dashboards
features.description: Real-time analytics, custom reports, sales forecasting, and performance metrics.

features.title: Mobile CRM
features.description: Full-featured mobile app for iOS and Android with offline access.

cta.title: Ready to Grow Your Business with CRM?
cta.description: Join 25,000+ companies using our CRM to close more deals and delight customers.
